name: Idle Tree Clicker
description:
Alpha Build of my first mobile game!

Click on the water drop and cloud workers! Watch them make Life Currency! Click on poops for extra currency. Upgrade and upgrade until you are Life Currency rich!  Saving is very glitchy, currently I only figured out how to save gold amount, shaft numbers (not levels), and tree level hehe.

---- Please leave me feedback and suggestions on the YouTube video below ----
